entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 5 this morning then steady. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 5 this morning then steady. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 19 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 14 March 2023
